程序包 org.cyy.fw.android.dborm
的使用

  • 使用org.cyy.fw.android.dborm的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.cyy.fw.android.dborm  
    org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite
    Provide the SQLite ORM scheme and DB Access API, Expose the SqliteDBFacade for users
    User need to extend it and do a few things more: (1).Name the DB, android will create the specified DB file in the databases folder of the application (2).Implement the configureORMClasses() method, configure all mapped POJO classes, the DB will create tables according to this configured classes
  • org.cyy.fw.android.dborm使用的org.cyy.fw.android.dborm中的类 
    类和说明
    AbstractORMapper
    abstract mapper class
    Caches the orm info
    ORMapInfo
    O-R map information
    ORMapInfo.AssociateInfo
    relation info
    ORMapper
    O-R mapping tool
    SQLObject
    SQL object includes SQL and binded parameter
    UniqueIDGenerator
    UID generator
  • org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.sqlite使用的org.cyy.fw.android.dborm中的类 
    类和说明
    ORMapInfo
    O-R map information
    SQLObject
    SQL object includes SQL and binded parameter
    UniqueIDGenerator
